TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Payljus, title = Payljus, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Payljus} }

S.FORM: Payljus Itiniay i Laiyi Cen no Pingtung ko Payljus a niyaro', 217 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 664 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 644 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 20 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 95%, Amis 1%, roma 2%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Payljos Itiniay i Laiyi Cen no Pingtong ko Payljos a niyaro', 217 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 664 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 644 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 20 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 95%, Amis 1%, roma 2%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
